Auto Accessible Color Picker

Auto Accessible Color Picker

Are you sick of searching for a web accessible color that is similar to your previous non-accessible colors! Well, be sick no more! This tool will allow you to input colors, and with the simple push of a button, a robot will turn them into better versions of themselves.

Please note, Auto Adjust aims for an approximately 4.5:1 ratio - which is suitable for small text.
